message: "According to a news release, the Blue Lightning Initiative is a collaboration between the Department of Homeland Security, the U.S. Department of Transportation and U.S. Customs and Border Protection." #Miami

data.description: Monday marks National Human Trafficking Awareness Day, and officials from Miami-Dade County, along with federal officials, spoke at Miami International Airport on Monday to announce that the airport will be joining the Blue Lightning Initiative against human trafficking.
data.title: Officials at Miami International Airport announce initiative against human trafficking
